text: Richard Mann (born April 20, 1947) is an American football coach. He was the wide receivers coach of the Pittsburgh Steelers from 2013 to 2017. He also served as an assistant coach for the Baltimore Colts, Indianapolis Colts, Cleveland Browns, New York Jets, Baltimore Ravens, Kansas City Chiefs, Washington Redskins and Tampa Bay Buccaneers. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:Arizona State Sun Devils football players Category:Arizona State Sun Devils football coaches Category:Louisville Cardinals football coaches Category:Baltimore Colts coaches Category:Indianapolis Colts coaches Category:Cleveland Browns coaches Category:New York Jets coaches Category:Baltimore Ravens coaches Category:Kansas City Chiefs coaches Category:Washington Redskins coaches Category:Tampa Bay Buccaneers coaches Category:Pittsburgh Steelers coaches
title: Richard Mann (American football)
